group_1.textRight: Um, excuse me, everyone, can I...?

group_1.textLeft: What's wrong, Kaede?

group_1.textRight: Would you guys like to set off some fireworks...?

group_1.textLeft: Fireworks?!
I'll handle the fireworks! I'm good at 'em!
But wait, are we prepared to use them?

group_1.textRight: Um...I don't think we packed any...
Uh, well, actually, we have them ready to go!

group_1.textLeft: Where will they be?
Wait, don't some beaches ban you from using@them at night?

group_1.textRight: They said it would be okay if we did them on the@lodge grounds.
The management, I mean.
But I forgot to ask if we could set fireworks off@on the beach itself...

group_1.textLeft: Then I'll go ask.

group_1.textRight: Thanks, Momoko.
Oh, wait, I have to tell Rena!

group_1.textLeft: Come to think of it, where is Rena, anyway?@And there's no sign of Yachiyo, either...

group_1.textRight: They're buying some more things from the@store first.
We need lighters and buckets.
Um... "Everyone is okay with the fireworks"...

group_1.textLeft: Thank goodness the convenience store had both@lighters and buckets.

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry to put you through all this...
I had been so focused on buying the fireworks@that I forgot to get the other things we needed...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, it's no problem, we got everything in the end.
We can use our smartphones as flashlights,@so we're all set.
Oh, Kaede sent a text!
It looks like everyone's gonna join us for the@fireworks.

group_1.textRight: I'm glad they were all still awake.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, and they're going to check whether we can@light fireworks on the beach right now.

group_1.textRight: Then depending on what they say, we may have@to go there.
We'll wait here for a bit.

group_1.textLeft: Okay!

group_1.textRight: ...Thank you, Rena.
And Kaede, too. I know I put you guys on the@spot...

group_1.textLeft: That's just like you, isn't it?
Taking care of Felicia and Tsuruno; worrying@about Ui and the others...
You're the one who's always looking out for@everyone.
And we've really given you a hard time on@this trip, but...
Right now, I completely understand what's going@through your mind.
Let me help you be selfish just this once, Yachiyo!

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle*
Please do. And thank you.

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, the manager said if we clean up after@ourselves, we can have fireworks on the beach!
C'mon, let's hurry to the beach!

group_1.textRight: Yes...!
